work.subtitle: Success stories that inspire

menufast.title: menufa.st
menufast.description: Innovative platform for generating digital menus and QR codes, specifically designed for restaurants. A modern solution that simplifies menu management and enhances customer experience.

usacaribbean.title: USA Caribbean Tours
usacaribbean.description: CMS-based system for bus ticket purchasing with custom forms for custom trips. Complete integration of SMTP and Stripe for payment processing. Project developed from scratch for Ponemus.com.

chamberfast.title: chamberfa.st
chamberfast.description: Our largest project yet, still under construction. All-in-one CMS-based system for chambers of commerce. Everything others offer separately, this system will have in one place.

checkprinter.title: Check Printer & Balance Manager
checkprinter.description: Specialized application for check printing adjusted to standard paper measurements. Includes printed check control and balance management with automatic tracking of income and expenses. A simple yet effective solution for financial management.

team.title: The Team
team.description: Meet the creative minds behind our exceptional work

disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Despite any rumors or visual similarities, I must clarify that I am not, in fact, Spider-Man. I just happen to be a web developer who's really good at catching bugs. Any wall-crawling abilities are purely coincidental and mostly related to my extensive experience with web development.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for may have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including personal information such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.description: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and protect our services and users.

cookies.title: Cookies & Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our services and hold certain information to improve your experience.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this privacy policy or with your consent.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights or ask questions about our privacy practices.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

services.title: Description of Services
services.description: We provide digital services including web development, design, and consulting. Services are provided 'as is' and we reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service without notice.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: All content, features, and functionality of our services are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

user.title: User Responsibilities
user.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. You must not violate any applicable laws or regulations.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever.
